activities:
As a Service Provider:

James Mintz Group, Inc.:
•	provides employment screening and credential verification services with respect to its clients’ prospective and/or current employees and other representatives, sometimes involving the transport of personal information from Europe to the United States.  
•	conducts investigations for its clients, sometimes involving the transport of personal information from Europe to the United States.
•	conducts e-discovery services for its clients, sometimes involving the transport of personal information from Europe to the United States 

To the extent that James Mintz Group, Inc. is subject to any EU privacy regime in connection with the services it provides to its clients, it is in its capacity as a data processor. 

As an Employer:

Having offices in the EEA and Switzerland, James Mintz Group, Inc. transfers personal information concerning its current, former, and prospective personnel in the EEA and Switzerland to the U.S. in connection with the management and operation of the company, human resources administration, and safety and security processes.  

•	Personal information may also be processed and transferred to the United States in connection with collection and discovery requests in the context of litigation or government investigations, and in such context it may be made available to adverse parties in litigation or governmental entities.
